snippet: Dr. Patrick Soon-Shiong, who made a fortune developing a cancer drug, has developed a relationship with Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. as he weighs life out of office.
abstract: White House Letter; Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr, who has declared he will lend his influence to cause of finding cure for cancer rather than running for president, seems to have faith in work of Dr Patrick Soon-Shiong; controversial medical entrepreneur and investor has developed important cancer drug and has expressed aspirations for greater projects aimed at battling cancer.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Patrick Soon-Shiong, who made a fortune developing a cancer drug, has developed a relationship with Vice President Joseph R. Biden Jr. as he weighs life out of office.

headline.main: If Cancer Becomes Biden’s Cause, a Bold but Polarizing Doctor Is On Call
headline.print_headline: If Cancer Becomes Biden’s Cause, a Doctor Is on Call
